_sText:
!!!Fixed version, no missing textures!!!

*Map Description*
Oh noes, the zombies want to steal christmas!
Prevent them of eating your brains and ruining christmas evening, hide inside the train, in one of the houses, in the office building, in the church or at the ski lift.

This map should make you looking forward to christmas this year! Christmas carols come from inside the houses, christmas trees everywhere and snow falling makes this map very ambient.
And there are a few secrets who are waiting to be found!


*Credits*

Map made by [ZfH] F4$tSw1tch
Thanks very much to:
Echo - for helping with the pine trees!
Mr. Kit - for his awesome Christmas Tree prefab!
all who helped me and gave me tipps!
support from the ZfH community (zombiesfromhell.net)
and RUS_D.J.I.H.A.D for the awesome house prefab!

*Other*
If you want the code for the secret door, PM me.

Have fun and Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year 2010!
Best regards,

F4$tSw1tch


Sry for the late release but it took ages to find the bugs.
